website_summaries.verdict: If you want the premium humidity experience provided by Danby dehumidifiers, and only need to work on confined places like bathrooms and closets, this inexpensive model is for you.
pros: For areas up to 1,500 square feet
cons: This dehumidifier is one of Danby’s less pricy options, but it was intended for smaller spaces and holds less moisture overall

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Danby dehumidifier. The first one lasted over 4 years, which is twice as long as two much more expensive dehumidifiers lasted. I don't know why they die so soon; I can remember the same dehumidifier in my home the whole time I was there when I was a kid. Anyway, now I'm happy if I can get 4 or 5 years out of them. This one is reasonably priced, and functions well. It is a bit louder than the previous one, but no big deal for me because of where I use it. Obviously just bought it, so we shall see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: cappy

product_meta.title: Danby Energy Star 30-Pint Dehumidifier
product_meta.description: Improve the comfort level of your home with Danby 30-Pint portable dehumidifier. This energy efficient unit operates quietly on 2 fan speeds (high/low) in rooms up to 1,500 square feet. It has a smart dehumidifying function that allows the unit to automatically control humidity by factoring in ambient room temperature. If the unit shuts off unexpectedly due to a power outage, it will automatically restart with the previous function settings when power is restored. The automatic de-icing system ensures the coils are always ice-free while the low temperature feature allows the system to continue to operate at temperatures as low as 41F. Maintenance is easy with the removable air filter and direct-drain system. Plus, Danby 30-Pint dehumidifier has four built-in caster wheels making it easy and convenient to move the unit from one room to another.
feature_bullets: Portable dehumidifier removes up to 30 pints of moisture from the air per day
